headline: Fight Over Mail-In Ballots  Has Shifted to Drop Boxes
text: From lawsuits by the Trump campaign to a decree from the governor of Texas — to the sudden appearance of boxes falsely labeled “official” in California — Republicans are intensifying efforts to eliminate the use of drop boxes to collect absentee ballots, or using them in ways that undermine confidence in their security.
snippet: Democrats are pushing to expand their use, while Republicans insist, without evidence, that they make election fraud easier — even as they deploy their own in California.
